Title: Golgrin's Reach
Description:
Now that we have the opals, we can meet Brinthe in Golgrin's Reach.

She said there's a project she's workin' on there she wants me tae help with.

I wonder what it is?
ObjectivesText: Meet Dagran at Golgrin's Reach in the Isle of Dorn.
RewardText:
An archaeological site? A titan vault?

Brinthe didna tell me about this!
